title: Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai's compensation topped $200 million in 2022
description: Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai received $226 million in total pay in 2022. Pichai was awarded over $200 million through a triennial stock plan.

title: How A.I.-powered robots are changing retail
description: An army of inventory robots is being deployed to help retailers appease angry customers, boost sales and respond to the ongoing worker shortage.

title: These are the 10 best destinations in the world for an eco-friendly vacation
description: Kayak's 2023 City Index for Mindful Travelers ranked the best cities in the world for sustainable travel.

title: Bill Gates says A.I. chatbots will teach kids to read within 18 months: You'll be 'stunned by how it helps'
description: Bill Gates said this week he believes it won't be long before artificial intelligence can be 'as good a tutor as any human ever could' for students.
